abstract: British Airways said on Wednesday it was in discussions with two of its largest U.S. rivals, American Airlines and Continental Airlines, which a source briefed on the matter told Reuters was about a potential alliance.
lead_paragraph: British Airways said on Wednesday it was in discussions with two of its largest U.S. rivals, American Airlines and Continental Airlines, which a source briefed on the matter told Reuters was about a potential alliance.

headline.main: BA Confirms Talks With American, Continental
